PATCH /courses/{courseId}/tasks/{taskId}/events/{envet:doing,finish}
参数：
字段	是否必填	描述
lastTime timestamp	是	最近一次记录任务的时间戳

responseCode.name: OK
responseCode.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

headers.name: Cache-Control
headers.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: Date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: Proxy-Connection
headers.description: Custom header

headers.name: Server
headers.description: A name for the server

headers.name: Transfer-Encoding
headers.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

headers.description: Custom header

headers.description: Custom header

headers.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

headers.name: expires
headers.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

headers.name: pragma
headers.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

{"id":"2054","sn":"C2017062711431190917","status":"created","paymentForm":{"action":"https://mapi.alipay.com/gateway.do?_input_charset=utf-8","method":"post","params":{"service":"alipay.wap.create.direct.pay.by.user","partner":"2088801030402123","payment_type":1,"_input_charset":"utf-8","sign_type":"MD5","out_trade_no":"C2017062711431190917","subject":"购买课程《这是一门普通课程》- 神神道道所","seller_id":"2088801030402123","total_fee":"0.01","notify_url":"http://devtest.edusoho.cn/pay/center/pay/alipay/notify","return_url":"http://devtest.edusoho.cn/pay/center/pay/alipay/return_for_app","show_url":"http://devtest.edusoho.cn/pay/center/success/show?id=2054","sign":"7677911cb89a7f6dd16e7a01332710a8"}},"paymentHtml":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>正在跳转到支付网关...</title>
<body>

  <form action="https://mapi.alipay.com/gateway.do?_input_charset=utf-8"  method="post" name="form">
          <input type="hidden" name="service" value="alipay.wap.create.direct.pay.by.user">
          <input type="hidden" name="partner" value="2088801030402123">

          <input type="hidden" name="out_trade_no" value="C2017062711431190917">
          <input type="hidden" name="subject" value="购买课程《这是一门普通课程》- 神神道道所">
          <input type="hidden" name="seller_id" value="2088801030402123">
          <input type="hidden" name="total_fee" value="0.01">
          <input type="hidden" name="notify_url" value="http://devtest.edusoho.cn/pay/center/pay/alipay/notify">
          <input type="hidden" name="return_url" value="http://devtest.edusoho.cn/pay/center/pay/alipay/return_for_app">
          <input type="hidden" name="show_url" value="http://devtest.edusoho.cn/pay/center/success/show?id=2054">
          <input type="hidden" name="sign" value="7677911cb89a7f6dd16e7a01332710a8">

  <script>
    document.all.form.submit();
  </script>

</body>
</html>"}
